Address.value: 9320 LAKESIDE BOULEVARD,SUITE 100, THE WOODLANDS, Texas, 77381, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Newpark Resources Inc is a global equipment supplier and leasing company to the oil and gas industry. Its operations are divided into two segments: Fluid Systems and Industrial Solutions. The Fluids Systems segment provides drilling fluids products and technical services to drilling sites predominantly located in North America and Europe, the Middle East, and Africa (EMEA). The Industrial Solutions segment, previously reported as Mats & Integrated Services, offers composite mat rentals, site construction services, and a newly added industrial disinfectant and cleaning solutions.
